content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
April 4, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Sigal Mandelker, of New York, to be Under Secretary for Terrorism and Financial Crimes, vice David S. Cohen, resigned.Heath P. Tarbert, of Maryland, to be an Assistant Secretary of the Treasury, vice Marisa Lago.
